pages.text: Forged in the $(blood)Hellfire Forge$() using elemental materials: $(item)Sand$(), $(item)Water Bucket$(), $(item)Fishing Rod$(), and $(item)Ghast Tear$(). Requires $(will)64 demon will minimum$() and consumes $(will)32 will$().

A reagent infused with the fury of storms and the power of lightning. This catalyst can be combined with a $(item)Reinforced Slate$() in an Alchemy Array to create the $(l:animus:sigils/sigil_storm)Sigil of the Storm$().

pages.title: Elemental Power
pages.text: The storm represents raw, untamed power - lightning that strikes from the heavens. The combination of water, tears, and fishing implements channels both the destructive and life-giving aspects of weather.$(br2)Wield the storm's fury wisely.
